INTRODUCTION.INTRO_PARAGRAPH: I am a self-taught Vancouver based full-stack developer with fluency in multiple front-end and back-end technologies. Currently I am working as a Software Developer Intern at Geotab Inc., where my team and I help transportation planners uncover previously hidden contextualized vehicle insights in an easy-to-use, easy-to-integrate platform.

ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_1: I'm Sanyam Gupta, a final year student at Simon Fraser University, majoring in Management Information Systems. If I had to describe myself in one word, it would be "autodidactic." Since I was young, I've loved learning new things on my own. Whether it's coding or exploring new topics, I've always been curious.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_2: When I started university, I didn't know anything about programming. But I taught myself by watching online videos on YouTube and Udemy, and now I am full-stack developer. Besides that, I'm really interested in data analytics and machine learning. Currently, I am working as a software developer intern at Geotab Inc., where I get to apply my skills in a professional setting.
